description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44175)- Support to refresh and calculate the Pivot Tables with calculated items 
(CELLSNET-44535)- Publicise the relevant APIs for adding/manipulating ActiveX controls including Toggle Button 
(CELLSNET-44482)- Provide an option to save the spreadsheet with Protected View 
(CELLSNET-44385)- Change character spacing in Excel Textbox 
(CELLSNET-41013)- Support for "WithoutChart" loading option 
(CELLSNET-44533)- Provide a way to specify the path where GridWeb stores temp session files 
(CELLSNET-44497)- Provide client side functions to select a range or to get the selected range using JavaScript 
(CELLSNET-44483)- Support Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop control to copy/paste rows within the control and between the control and excel 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44502)- Support gridlines for Excel to HTML converts 
(CELLSNET-44525)- Support decimal value returned by implementation of ICustomFunction and CalculationData.CalculatedValue 
(CELLSNET-44492)- Print quality of the simulated bold font is not good 
(CELLSNET-44530)- Add Comment Property to ListObject/Table 
(CELLSNET-44523)- Using Array Formulas in Smart Markers 
(CELLSNET-44509)- ImportDataTable with insertRows=true replaces first row with blank line 
(CELLSNET-44480)- Apply table style to rich text setting 
Performance
(CELLSNET-44512)- Performance problem in Cells.CopyRows() method 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-44514)- PivotItem.IsHidden problem when refresh data 
(CELLSNET-44513)- Export Html to Excel - the text A1 added to the end of link 
(CELLSNET-44500)- File becomes corrupted after pivot table refresh and copy workbook 
(CELLSNET-44470)- Cell shading is not applied uniformly while converting spreadsheet to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44467)- Cannot export all html content to excel when the html has nested div elements. 
(CELLSNET-44490)- Issue with Custom time format 
(CELLSNET-44201)- Issue regarding unsupported chars indices in CHAR formula 
(CELLSNET-44521)- Conversion to PDF results in 2 PDF pages as opposed to Excel print preview 
(CELLSNET-44489)- Excel to PDF Conversion - Justified character lost with its formatting 
(CELLSNET-44481)- Excel to PDF rendering - Page break position has been changed 
(CELLSNET-44531)-Aspose.Cells renders the same worksheet to images in different size in Session 1 vs Session 0
(CELLSNET-44491)- Non-system installed font not working for textboxes 
(CELLSNET-44433)- Image rendered differently from the original chart 
(CELLSNET-44074)- Unnecessary lines on the chart while exporting Chart to Image 
(CELLSNET-44012)- Chart image is different from the source 
(CELLSNET-40572)- Chart area becomes gibberish when converted to PDF .NET 
(CELLSNET-44536)-Aspose.Cells incorrectly recognizes the font size of chart title
(CELLSNET-44522)- Set the text to the shape from the template file. 
(CELLSNET-44519)- References in table become broken after importing two dimension array into the table 
(CELLSNET-44511)- References in table become broken after some manipulation with file 
(CELLSNET-44508)- Different page sizes in the output Pdfs than Excel 
(CELLSNET-44507)- Issue with Shape.GetCharacters() method 
(CELLSNET-44505)- Cell validation does not work correctly with INDIRECT function 
(CELLSNET-44498)- Header rows do not repeat when spreadsheet is converted to PDF with Turkish locale 
(CELLSNET-44496)- OTT is detected as ODS 
(CELLSNET-44494)- TextBox.IsFilled set to false but fill appears as light blue when ODS is viewed in OpenOffice 
(CELLSNET-44488)- File become corrupted after shape.UpdateSelectedValue 
(CELLSNET-44329)- Different saved Pdf file page sizes for selected or not selected cells in the Excel file 
(CELLSNET-44271)- ODS to PDF: first 2 pages contain blue shade 
(CELLSNET-44172)- Change in behaviour for Smart Marker processing when used in Pivot Table across 8.6.1 and 8.6.3 
(CELLSNET-44499)- Unable to get property 'style' of undefined or null reference, caused by setting GridWeb1.ShowHeaderBar to false 
(CELLSNET-44440)- Dropdown in GridWeb shows 4 entries but there are 2 entries under German locale 
(CELLSNET-44493)-ArgumentException: Parameter is not valid, while resizing the form control containing
(CELLSNET-44524)-Handling large Excel files with Gridweb
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44528)- ArgumentOutOfRangeException in PivotTable.CalculateData 
(CELLSNET-44526)- Exception: "Input string was not in a correct format." when loading an HTML file format 
(CELLSNET-44534)- Exception on Workbook.Save method.
(CELLSNET-44506)- InvalidFormula exception at  GridWeb.ImportExcelFile 
(CELLSNET-41993)- Exception when calling designer.Process()
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
